attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament Immediatley or at the earliest opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to dissolve the existing government as a result of the public anger and outcry over MP's expenses and allowance claims. A government may only govern with the explicit compliance and permission of the electorate and we the undersigned believe that this compliance and permission has now been withdrawn. In this case - continuing with this Parliament would be unlawful and would not be representing the wishes, desires and interests of the free men and women of this country as allowed in Common Law.
We therefore petition the Prime Minister to dissolve this corrupt Parliament at once.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
